'''Tinted glass''' is a [[dye]]d variant of the [[glass]] block in the 2013 joke update [[Java Edition 2.0]], it was later added as [[stained glass]] in [[Java Edition 1.7.2|1.7.2]].

== Obtaining ==

=== Breaking ===
Tinted glass drops itself only if it is broken with a [[tool]] enchanted with [[Silk Touch]]. Otherwise, it drops nothing.
{{breaking row|All Tinted Glass|link=Colored Tinted Glass|horizontal=1|hardness=0.3|drop=0}}
